body.name: 400 Piece Large First Aid Kit Premium Emergency Kits for Home, Office, Car, Outdoor, Hiking, Travel, Camping, Survival Medical First Aid Bag, Red
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 15 hrs 28 mins
features: ESSENTIALS FOR EMERGENCY - This first aid kit contains total 400 pieces first aid supplies which can be applied to handle your emergency situations during normal life, for example you can use the essentials from the emergency bag to care for minor scrapes, burns, wounds etc. There are adhesive bandages, tourniquet, bandages, emergency blanket, burn gel pack, first aid guide, etc. in the emergency bag, with such items you can get ready for unknown situations better.

WITH DIVIDED COMPARTMENT - This emergency kit bag uses smart classification with label, we've separated the whole emergency bag into small independent compartments, which is clear and concise, so that you can find the first aid item you need in case of emergency situation. The orderly first aid box helps to ensure your wounds to be treated as soon as possible.

PORTABLE DESIGN - This VRIEXSD first aid kit in the design of its size in order to allow users to carry it to get prepared for emergencies, so the compact size of 9.4*3.9*6.8 inches is the most suitable design. VRIEXSD first aid box weighs only 2.64 pounds and can be hung on your backpack or stored in your cars, trucks, jeep or other places in case of emergency.

PREMIUM MATERIAL - The medical kit bag is made of high-quality material, which is durable and sturdy. The 600D polyester fabric is with great waterproof ability, you don't need to worry about the emergency accessories in the first aid kits being affected by water even in the rain or wind, the water-resistance design of the emergency kit makes this product ideal for extreme adventure activities.

FOR EMERGENCY SITUATIONS - You can store this kind of premium first aid box in your home, office, classroom and so on, can be used for families, disaster preparedness. This type of first aid kit is perfect for people who love hiking, camping and other outdoor activities, ideal for care during sports or leisure to meet any emergency needs. You can also choose this product for your family and friends.
body.description: Detail Supplies in First Aid Kit 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 3/4“×3”, 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 1“×3”, 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 3/8“ × 1-1/2" , 5 x Wound Closure strip, 1 x Triangular Bandage 40"×40"×56“, 11 x Moleskin (Blister Prevention), 1 x 7 Days Pill Box, 1 x Digital Thermometer, 1 x Self Adhesive Bandage 1"×5yd, 1 x Durable Compression Bandage/Elastic Bandage With Clips 3"×5yd, 1 x Conforming Gauze Roll 2"×5yd, 2 x First Aid Tape 1/2"×5yd, 8 x Sterile Gauze Pads 2"×2", 1 x CPR Face Shield, 1 x Metal Scissors, 1 x First Aid Guide, 1 x Durable First Aid Bag, 244 x Other Emergency Essentials

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TRY VRIEXSD FIRST AID KIT VRIEXSD hope that every user can have a calm feeling when facing emergency situations, only when we live preparedness so that we can handle every emergency calmly and orderly when it comes. This well organized first aid kit will provide a quick and clear help when facing emergency, so that you can take actions quickly to help your whole family members. VRIEXSD is a trusted VRIEXSD in providing high-quality first aid supplies to support your outdoor activities like hiking, camping, traveling etc. MORE ABOUT VRIEXSD LARGE FIRST AID KIT 1. Well organized first aid kit, every supply is kept safe in the bag and you can find the thing you need quickly and accurately. 2. Refillable design, you can choose to add replacement first aid supplies into the kit according to your needs, so that it will never run out. 3. High-quality material makes this kit bag durable and sturdy. 4. Lightweight and compact, can be attached to almost every thing.
Ideal for different kinds of outdoor & indoor activities. Portable to your backpack Get Preparedness for family Perfect for cycling

Detail Supplies in First Aid Kit 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 3/4“×3”, 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 1“×3”, 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 3/8“ × 1-1/2" , 5 x Wound Closure strip, 1 x Triangular Bandage 40"×40"×56“, 11 x Moleskin (Blister Prevention), 1 x 7 Days Pill Box, 1 x Digital Thermometer, 1 x Self Adhesive Bandage 1"×5yd, 1 x Durable Compression Bandage/Elastic Bandage With Clips 3"×5yd, 1 x Conforming Gauze Roll 2"×5yd, 2 x First Aid Tape 1/2"×5yd, 8 x Sterile Gauze Pads 2"×2", 1 x CPR Face Shield, 1 x Metal Scissors, 1 x First Aid Guide, 1 x Durable First Aid Bag, 244 x Other Emergency Essentials Features about First Aid Kit 600D Polyester Material Size: 9.4*3.9*6.8 inches Compact, lightweight & portable MOLLE Compatible

What's in the kit, are there any detailed supplies? 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 3/4“×3”, 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 1“×3”, 40 x Adhesive Plastic Bandages 3/8“ × 1-1/2" , 5 x Wound Closure strip, 1 x Triangular Bandage 40"×40"×56“, 11 x Moleskin (Blister Prevention), 1 x 7 Days Pill Box, 1 x Digital Thermometer, 1 x Self Adhesive Bandage 1"×5yd, 1 x Durable Compression Bandage/Elastic Bandage With Clips 3"×5yd, 1 x Conforming Gauze Roll 2"×5yd, 2 x First Aid Tape 1/2"×5yd, 8 x Sterile Gauze Pads 2"×2", 1 x CPR Face Shield, 1 x Metal Scissors, 1 x First Aid Guide, 1 x Durable First Aid Bag and other 244 essentials for emergency, total 400 pieces. What's the size of this first aid kit, is it portable? This first aid kit weighs 2.64 lbs with the size of 9.4*3.9*6.8 inches, you can attach it to your backpack, bike or store it in your car, RV, home and other places. What if the supplies in the kit run out of use? Can I fill it with other type of emergency essentials? This first aid kit is designed refillable, so that you can fill it with other supplies for emergency if you need. But the original supplies have covered the supplies for almost all kinds of emergency situations. Is there approximate shelf life of the items? The items for cuts, injured wounds, burns and abrasions care have an expired date of 3 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and all the necessities to keep in the car!
reviews.reviewText: I like to be prepared for anything in all situations. This first aid kit has everything I could need, and it stays in my car for any emergency that may happen while on the road (road trips, camping, music festivals). Great deal and excellent quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great selection of items in a very nice and durable case. Plenty of items for first aid that I keep in my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No pain relief in this kit, but has everything else
reviews.reviewText: Bag is well made, has the basics. Compact size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to have
reviews.reviewText: Compact. Holds a lot of items. It’s lite and small enough so to camping or in any vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well stocked and well packaged
reviews.reviewText: Really like how thoughtfully packaged and equipped this kit is

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact but powerful
reviews.reviewText: This pack was smaller than we expected. However, it is easily accessible, almost ingenious in its design, and has an abundant variety of medical needs. It is imperative one opens it and gets familiar with contents as there is more than you’d expect buy items can be easily missed if you’re not familiar before you need them. All in all, it’s i good price for a lot of important e regency needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First aid kit
reviews.reviewText: It seems to be stocked pretty well for minor cuts and such. As a beginning prepper I added some sutures and other things that might be useful in the event that we are cut off from civilization.
